Category: instrument
Definition: a medium-sized stringed instrument"},{"input":"add musical term allegro;italian;tempo;lively, fast","result":"Added term: allegro

Category: style
Definition: solemn, solemnly"},{"input":"add musical term forte;italian;dynamic;strong or loud","result":"Added term: forte

Definition: strong or loud"},{"input":"add musical term pianissimo;italian;dynamic;very soft or quiet","result":"Added term: pianissimo

musicalTerms: [{"musicalTermName":"feierlich","musicalTermCategory":"style","musicalTermOrigin":"german","musicalTermDefinition":"solemn, solemnly"},{"musicalTermName":"allegro","musicalTermCategory":"tempo","musicalTermOrigin":"italian","musicalTermDefinition":"lively, fast"},{"musicalTermName":"viola","musicalTermCategory":"instrument","musicalTermOrigin":"italian","musicalTermDefinition":"a medium-sized stringed instrument"},{"musicalTermName":"forte","musicalTermCategory":"dynamic","musicalTermOrigin":"italian","musicalTermDefinition":"strong or loud"},{"musicalTermName":"pianissimo","musicalTermCategory":"dynamic","musicalTermOrigin":"italian","musicalTermDefinition":"very soft or quiet"}]
